title: minecraft无法安装运行
author: 雪雪是妹控
txt_content:
本帖最后由 雪雪是妹控 于 2012-2-19 11:45 编辑 我用的是论坛中的破解版还有全绿色中文启动器然后启动后全部出现 file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1293304741/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/XTY0YMPK14C`IE35GBH6(70.jpg       Bad video card drivers!             -----------------------       Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode. This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers. --- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 -------- Generated 12-2-18 下午10:28 Minecraft: Minecraft 1.1 OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1 Java: 1.6.0_31, Sun Microsystems Inc. VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc. LWJGL: 2.4.2 [failed to get system properties (java.lang.NullPointerException)] org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method) at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52) at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:185) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:311) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:856) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:784) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:765) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:230) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:648) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) --- END ERROR REPORT b200a08b ---------- 也就是百度论坛上的   Bad video card drivers! 报错 系统XP32位 硬件加速关闭       尝试无效 显卡驱动已更新   尝试无效 因为显卡为inter（R） G41 Express Chipset 所以尝试使用“ gen7”大编写的minecraft 出现






Failed to update news
java.net.SocketException: Connection reset
 意味不明file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1293304741/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/G98W]KI6E5DL_EH32OLE$W9.jpg 点击登录输入账号和密码后（在里面提示的网址中注册的）file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1293304741/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/(@$]X{LOHG06%EORR5R%1SH.jpg 但是却 提示file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1293304741/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/B3K~R4]~@DF2_EI4PWMD4K8.jpg 求解账户名不存在？（user not premium）英文无力 请各位大大帮忙

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
雪雪是妹控 发表于 2012-2-19 14:32 
我想解决的是我用gen7编写的登陆程序却无法登陆的问题？
我的账号在官网是可以登陆的啊
尝试一下硬件加速不要全关，调到左边第三格

replies.author: 雪雪是妹控
replies.txt_content: 为什么我的图片都死了……

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content:
1.請不要使用自家電腦的路徑，請上傳至圖床
2.Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.你缺少了OpenGL請去Intel檢查你的驅動程式是否為最新的。
3.如果不行的話(Intel似乎沒有較高版本的OpenGL)，安裝windows 7作業系統應該解決(我的筆電也是Intel，本來也不能玩，換了windows 7作業系統後就可以玩了，此選擇慎用，不然乖乖玩C版吧~)

Bad video card drivers!      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.
我只能從這三句判斷:就是openGL的問題
